entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:05 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
